meanings.definition: A person who removes weeds from a garden or field.
meanings.sent1: The weeders worked hard to clear the garden of unwanted plants.
meanings.sent2: The group of weeders gathered every morning to tend to the flower beds.
meanings.sent3: The weeders joked about having to battle the stubborn weeds in the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent4: She was like a skilled weeders, swiftly eliminating any unwanted growth in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The young weeders proudly showed off their weed-free garden to the neighbors.

meanings.definition: Tools used for removing weeds from the ground.
meanings.sent1: The gardener's shed was filled with various weeders for different types of weeds.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the right weeders for the job before starting to work in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The old weeders in the shed had seen many seasons of hard work.
meanings.sent4: The weeders in her hands were like magic wands, making the garden pristine again.
meanings.sent5: With the trusty weeders in hand, she tackled the overgrown flower bed with determination.
